articles.title: Recognising Obesity As A Chronic Disease, Not Lifestyle Choice - CodeBlue
articles.description: The Asia-Oceania Association for the Study of Obesity points to a genetic code designed for famine and the discovery of processed food that makes excess body weight “very hard to reverse”.

articles.title: Pooja Nansi: Director of the Singapore Writers Festival - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: It’s been three years since the Singapore Writers Festival appointed its first female director. CNA Women catches up with Pooja Nansi to see where she’s at with her mission to democratise the arts.
articles.content:
Its exciting and encouraging. 
Despite its reputation for being cheem, I truly believe that poetry is a democratic space, relevant to each and every one of us, said Nansi.
